title: Binary Search Tree In-Order Successor
description: In computer science, a binary search tree (BST) is a binary tree data structure in which the value of each node in the tree is greater than or equal to any value in its left subtree and less than or equal to any value in its right subtree. In this challenge, we are going to find the in-order successor of a given node in a binary search tree.

meta.title: Binary Search Tree Successor | Computer Science Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to find the in-order successor of a node in a binary search tree, a fundamental data structure in computer science.
meta.keywords: binary search tree, in-order successor, computer science, data structures, programming tutorial
